main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported in the Niagara Falls area on June 13, 1963, lasting approximately 40 minutes.
interesting points: Witnesses included local residents and personnel at Niagara Falls International Airport, The sightings were reported to the Air Force by press representatives, The concluding investigation suggested the sightings were probably due to a satellite, Observers described a long afterglow and a zigzag motion of the objects, The event preceded further detailed reports of other UFO sightings in the area.
witness description: local residents, newspaper reporters, and FAA staff
